about_the_game:
Rule: Don't scream

The Death Game takes place in a closed haunted house.
If the microphone volume exceeds the deadline, the game is over.
Can you clear this death game without screaming through all 3 stages?

In order to escape, you must collect the specified items.
Endure fear while exploring.
If the microphone volume exceeds the deadline it will game over. If the game over, you will restart from the entrance of that stage.

After clearing all stages, "After Story" will begin (single-ended / microphone not required).

About the microphone

The use of a microphone enhances the immersive experience.
Your voice will be reflected in the gameplay.

*You can play without using a microphone.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti
